name: Invasion (itch) (datoneguy246)
description:
Invasion!:

Is a really bad game I made years ago. 

I found it on an old USB drive that I needed to clear but I didn't want to delete it. So I put it up here. 

I no longer have the original project files and I only found the Mac version on the drive... sorry, macs only.

To the 9.57 of computer users who use macs, (yes I looked it up) keep in mind that this game is short, stupid, buggy, lacks an incredible amount of polish, and was made around the same time that I made the nightmare that is The Very Hungry Snake.

...but at the same time, it's free.

Do you have Catalina and it's not letting you open the app?

Well here's how you can run the game:

1. Right click on the app and click "Open Package Contents".

2. Open up the folder titled "MacOS".

3. Open up terminal and type: "chmod +x "

4. Drag in the file from the MacOS folder into terminal after the line you typed.

5. Press enter.

6. The file in MacOS should now be an executable file and the app should open normally now.

If Catalina is still giving you trouble and saying that this is from an unauthorized developer...

1. Open System Preferences

2. Click "Security and Privacy".

3. Click "Open Anyways" at the bottom.

Hopefully Apple fixes these issues in the next OS.
